Even Sergey Brin was in all praise for Eric Schmidt but also mentioned about his personal passions and new products saying, I'd like to mention that I've had a great time working with Larry Page now for 15 years and Eric Schmidt for a decade. Both of them have inspired and moved me. I would like to work more on my personal passions. There will be several new products I'm working on. I've been accused of vaporware recently, so I won't talk about them yet. But soon. There are many analysts who believe that Larry Pages lacks experience in the top CEO level. inspired by X Factor judge Simon Cowell . The actress told The Sun that she thinks her alter-ego, famous for her cutting put-downs, would make a great panellist on the TV talent show. She said: I think Sue Sylvester has British in her. I think the US look at the British as a race that tells it how it is.`` And if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her.`` He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her.
